trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting"> </xref> evento di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event to customize the conversion of a cell value into a format suitable for display or to customize the appearance of a cell depending on its state or value.
trans-unit.target: Gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>evento per personalizzare la conversione di un valore di cella in un formato appropriato per la visualizzazione o per personalizzare l'aspetto di una cella a seconda del relativo stato o un valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>evento si verifica ogni volta che ogni cella viene disegnato, è consigliabile evitare lunga elaborazioni quando si gestisce questo evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: This event also occurs when the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> is retrieved or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento si verifica anche quando la cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>viene recuperato o dai relativi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is initialized with the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Quando si gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>evento, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà viene inizializzata con il valore della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se si fornisce la conversione dal valore della cella personalizzata per il valore di visualizzazione, la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà valore convertito, verificando che il nuovo valore del tipo specificato nella cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per indicare che non è necessaria alcuna ulteriore valore formattazione, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando il gestore dell'evento viene completata, se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è `null` oppure non è del tipo corretto, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è `false`, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>viene formattata utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>proprietà dello stile di cella restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, che viene inizializzato con la cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the display properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are used to render the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indipendentemente dal valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, le proprietà di visualizzazione dell'oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà vengono utilizzati per il rendering della cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom formatting using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'utilizzo di formattazione personalizzata di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>eventi, vedere [procedura: personalizzare la formattazione dei dati nel controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare effetti negativi sulle prestazioni quando si gestisce questo evento, accedere alla cella tramite i parametri del gestore eventi anziché accedere direttamente alla cella.

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event.
trans-unit.target: Per personalizzare la conversione di un valore formattato specificato dall'utente in un valore di cella effettivo, gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The `desiredType` parameter represents the type that the `value` parameter should be converted to, and `desiredType` is assigned the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il `desiredType` rappresenta il tipo di parametro che il `value` parametro deve essere convertito in, e `desiredType` viene assegnato alla cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a cell is formatting picture names as bitmaps, `value` is the <xref:System.String> that contains the picture name, and `desiredType` is a <xref:System.Type> representing the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> type.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se i nomi di immagine come bitmap, della cella `value` è il <xref:System.String>che contiene il nome dell'immagine, e `desiredType` è un <xref:System.Type>che rappresenta il <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>tipo.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event handler does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property to a type that can be displayed by the cell, the cell contents will be formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>gestore dell'evento non viene impostato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>proprietà a un tipo che può essere visualizzato dalla cella, il contenuto verrà formattato mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: Indice di colonna della cella che ha causato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: Indice di riga della cella che ha causato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto della cella.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert `value` to.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo da convertire `value` per.

trans-unit.source: The style of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: Lo stile della cella che ha causato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 -or- rowIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexè minore di -1 - oppure - rowIndex è minore di -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile della cella che viene formattato.

trans-unit.source: Setting the properties of the object returned by the CellStyle property will change how the cell and its contents are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione delle proprietà dell'oggetto restituito dalla proprietà CellStyle modificare la modalità di visualizzazione della cella e il relativo contenuto.

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties, use this property to change the cell styles rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare effetti negativi sulle prestazioni, utilizzare questa proprietà per modificare gli stili di cella, anziché accedere direttamente alla cella.

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli stili di cella, vedere [stili della cella nel controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the display style of the cell being formatted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> che rappresenta lo stile di visualizzazione della cella formattato.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è il valore della cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice di colonna della cella che viene formattata.

trans-unit.source: Use the ColumnIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà ColumnIndex per ottenere un indice nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: Indice di colonna della cella che viene formattata.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell value has been successfully formatted.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il valore della cella è stato formattato correttamente.

trans-unit.source: When handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, set the FormattingApplied property to `true` after setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property if no further value formatting is required.
trans-unit.target: Quando si gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>evento, impostare la proprietà FormattingApplied `true` dopo l'impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>proprietà se è richiesto alcun valore ulteriore formattazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: If the FormattingApplied property value is `false` when the event handler exits, the formatting will be applied to the value as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore della proprietà FormattingApplied `false` quando si chiude il gestore dell'evento, la formattazione verrà applicata al valore indicato dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>le proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the formatting for the cell value has been handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la formattazione del valore della cella è stata gestita; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice di riga della cella che viene formattata.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà RowIndex per ottenere un indice nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: Indice di riga della cella che viene formattata.
